Chimp Millionaire is the channel for the XRP community and Crypto Lovers. For those who see things differently.
 
That is why we are here, so we can chat with each other in this channel and understand the live market movements.

We share with each other the best alternatives and ideas on our everyday life's.
If you are one of these people. My Friend….This Channel Is For You!

Channels Goal - High Quality Content, Satisfactory for the community.
